title: PODIUM – Who knows this 20s display font?
content:
Hi guys, I'm looking for this font. WhatTheFont can't find it because it's to blurred, but perhaps someone of you knows this font?

Thanks in advance!

Cheers,  
®ene

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [PODIUM\_ZW.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829001407/http:/typophile.com/files/PODIUM_ZW.jpg) | 51.58 KB |
author: Rene Verkaart

comments.content: Don't have the answer but with some little tweaking, you could get pretty close starting with [Giorgio Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829001407/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/giorgio/sans) (using the alternate /O).
Not quite, but close! Does perhaps anybody have the real answer? ;-)
Nobody? Do I have to make the font myself? I can... ;-)
